import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { ArrowRightIcon, EnvelopeIcon, LockClosedIcon, UserIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/solid'; import { registerUser } from '../actions/auth'; export default function App() { const [isLogin, setIsLogin] = useState(true); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', password: '', password2: '', username: '', }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prevData => ({ ...prevData, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if(!isLogin){ const resp = await registerUser(formData); if(resp.error){ alert(resp.error); } if(resp.access){ localStorage.setItem('access_token', resp.access); localStorage.setItem('user_details', JSON.stringify(resp.user)); } return; } c }; return (

{isLogin ? 'Welcome Back!' : 'Create an Account'}
